relation: Great for these types of students
A little reserved at first, but a place where you can make a difference.
It seems like there are a lot of activities which I cannot wait to be a part of.
Haven't experienced it, but reviews seems good for college dining
In my opinion has the nicest freshman dorms

A small catholic college located on the beautiful Hudson River.The college is located in Newburgh in the mid-Hudson Valley region of New York State. It was founded in 1960 by the Dominican Sisters. The campus gives you a feeling like a fairly close school community.

textAfterTable: Dorothy from Derby, CT 06/21/2011 Reviewer is Accepted here and planning to attend soon. Reviewer has been to campus. 3 out of 4 people found this review useful. 1 person found this inaccurate. 2 of 25 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Great if you want to be a Teacher they have a school on Campus with kids to get the feel of being a teacher before the real world. Nurses get experiences too. Tips for prospective students We have a shuttle to take us to the mall and shopping free of charge. Bang for the buck The dorms are a great bargain along with the meal plan which is all you can eat. Laundry here is good. Academic Rigor We have so many thing to learn for Radio to teacher to Nursing.
